story.text: We find that one or more weekly structured [[Zoom Meeting]]s which give the opportunity to summarise the previous weeks work, and set the agenda for the next learning cycle suit many types of community.
The proceeds of these meetings are often recorded, and mixed together to create a [[Final Show]] at the end of the [[pod cycle]]. This may be a simple as recording a 10 minute presentation

item.text:
# Weekly meet and greet
We find that one or more weekly structured [[Zoom Meeting]]s which give the opportunity to summarise the previous weeks work, and set the agenda for the next learning cycle suit many types of community.
The proceeds of these meetings are often recorded, and mixed together to create a [[Final Show]] at the end of the [[pod cycle]]. This may be a simple as recording a 10 minute presentation

We find that one or more weekly structured [[Zoom Meeting]]s which give the opportunity to summarise the previous weeks work, and set the agenda for the next learning cycle suit many types of community.
